source: La dezbateri au mai participat, primarii comunelor şi ai oraşelor, preşedinţii Comisiilor Situaţii Excepţionale Locale, membrii Comisiei raionale, administraţia raionului.
target: Also participating in the debates were the mayors of communes and cities, the presidents of the Local Emergency Commissions, members of the district commission, and the district administration.
